What makes Coreum unique?

Coreum is a 3rd-gen, layer-1, enterprise-grade blockchain built for decentralized applications. With IBC interoperability, ISO20022 messaging and Smart Tokens featuring natively programmable business logic, it’s highly scalable for modern digital economies.

Coreum supports diverse use cases by leveraging its Smart Tokens, including tokenizing real-world assets, decentralized identity, gaming economies, ISO 20022 messaging, NeoBanking, and CBDCs. The $COREUM token enables staking, network governance and fuels its ecosystem built for global regulatory compliance.

Coreum’s geo-distributed infrastructure enhances security and reliability at an institutional level, providing everything you need to build and scale decentralized applications.
